I recommend watching La La Land. It is a musical romantic drama film directed by Damien Chazelle.

The story revolves around two passionate artists - Sebastian (Idris Elba) and Mia (Emma Stone). The two characters are in love with each other, but the obstacles they face prevent them from achieving their dreams.

La La Land received critical acclaim upon its release. It has won several awards including eight Academy Awards, three Golden Globes, and one BAFTA Award.

Overall, La La Land is an exceptional musical romantic drama film that showcases Chazelle's extraordinary talent as a filmmaker.
